DOC.brief_summary: To determine median effective concentration ropivacaine hydrochloride ultrasound-guided supraclavicular brachial plexus block . The result provide reference choose appropriate drug concentration clinical anesthesia .
DOC.brief_title: The Study Ropivacaine Median Effective Concentration Ultrasound-guided Supraclavicular Brachial Plexus Block
DOC.criteria: ASA I II upper limb paresthesia allergic local anesthetic surgery history clavicle BMI > 30kg/m^2
